actionType.description:

devanningInd.description:
Devanning site indicator
Y - Yes
N - No

examInd.description:
Exam site indicator
Y - Yes
N - No

type.description:
The user type of this user.
Possible value:
PERSON
EMPLOYEE
RP

name.description: The English name of this user

chiName.description: The Chinese name of this user

phoneNo.description: The primary phone number of this user

phoneNo2.description: The alternative phone number of this user

faxNo.description: The fax number of this user

enabled.description:
Whether this user account is enabled

0 - disabled
1 - enabled

locked.description:
Whether this user account is locked
0 - not locked
1 - locked

lockedDatetime.description: The time when this user account is locked

userGovInd.description:
Whether the created user is a government user.
Possible value:
0 - non-government user
1 - government user

testAcctInd.description:
Whether the created user is a testing account.
Possible value:
0 - normal user
1 - testing user

driverInd.description:
Whether the created user is a truck driver.
Possible value:
0 - not a truck driver
1 - is a truck driver

idCheckInd.description:
Whether the identity of this user is vetted
Possible value:
0 - ID not checked
1 - ID checked

activatedInd.description:
Whether this user account is activated
Possible value:
0 - Not activated
1 - Activated

supportDocInd.description:
Pending submission of Company/Organisation's Authorisation Letter Possible value:
0 - Pending
1 - Submitted

addrLangInd.description:
Address language indicator:
C - Chinese
E - English

locale.description: The preferred language of this external user – en, zh_CN or zh_HK

idType.description: The type of identity owned by this external user – HKID, PASSPORT, PRCEEP (PRC Exit Entry Permit) or OTHER

profileVersion.description: The version of the profile of this user

delInd.description:
Whether this record is mark deleted
Possible value:
0 - Not deleted
1 - Deleted

line1.description:
Line 1 of the address
If specified, this field must not be blank or null.

idType.description: The type of identity owned by this organisation – BR, CS, EI, NLC or OTHER.

idNo.description: The identity number of this organisation.

phoneNo.description: The primary phone number of this organisation.

phoneNo2.description: The alternative phone number of this organisation.

addrLangInd.description:
Address language indicator:
C - Chinese
E - English

businessNature.description:
Business Nature(s) in Hong Kong, separate with commas:
C – Cargo Freight Forwarding
T – Transportation of Cargo
W – Warehouse of Cargo
O – Others (Please specify, e.g. Data Entry Services Provider)

profileVersion.description: The version of the profile of this organization.

version.description: Bundling version,  start from 1 and increment by one for each bundling updated

channel.description:
Submission channel:
I - IVRS
M - Mobile
S - Bulk (System to System)
W - Web

impExpInd.description:
Import/Export indicator:
I - Import
E - Export

unassociatedBatchCcrnList.description: List of CCRNs whose assoicated batchCCRN should be updated to NULL

party.description:
Submitter Party:
DRIVER - Submitted by truck DRIVER
AGENT - Submitted by agent (applicable to Phase 3A only)
VASP - Submitted by VASP (applicable to Phase 3B and after)

expectedLbcp.description: The code of expected Customs Land Boundary Control Point

bundlingCompleteDatetime.description: Bundling completion datetime which is calulated in STD.

idType.description:
Driver ID type.
C - China, PRC exit-entry permit number
H - HKID

inOneGoInd.description:
In-one-go indicator:
Y - submission in-one-go
N - submission not in-one-go

ccrnList.description: List of CCRNs included in the bundling

bundlingCode.description:
Response Information Code:
11 - The bundling of CCRN(s) with the vehicle is successful. The subject vehicle can cross the LBCP for customs clearance after 30 minutes after successful bundling.
12 - The bundling of CCRN(s)with the vehicle is successful. The subject vehicle can cross the LBCP for customs clearance after 5 minutes after successful bundling.
13 - The amendment of bundling of CCRN(s) with the vehicle is successful. The subject vehicle can cross the LBCP for customs clearance after 30 minutes after successful amendment of bundling.
14 - The amendment of bundling of CCRN(s)with the vehicle is successful. The subject vehicle can cross the LBCP for customs clearance after 5 minutes after successful bundling.

ccrn.description:
Customs Cargo Reference Number
Mandatory if transport mode is ROAD

goodsItemNo.description:
Goods item sequence number
Mandatory if transport mode is ROAD

actualControlPoint.description:
Actual Control Point Location
Mandatory if transport mode is ROAD

matchedInd.description:
Matched Indicator
Y - Keyword Matched
N - Keyword not matched

ceRefNo.description:
C&E Reference Number
Mandatory if transport mode is AIR

umr.description:
Unique Manifest Reference
Mandatory if transport mode is OCEAN, RIVER, FERRY and RAIL

specialStatement.description:
Special Statement
Mandatory if transport mode is OCEAN, RIVER, FERRY and RAIL

version.description:
Version Number
Mandatory if transport mode is OCEAN, RIVER, FERRY and RAIL

masterItemNo.description:
Master Item No
Mandatory if transport mode is OCEAN, RIVER, FERRY and RAIL

consignmentItemNo.description:
Consignment Item No
Mandatory if transport mode is OCEAN, RIVER, FERRY and RAIL

cargoItemNo.description:
Cargo Item No
Mandatory if transport mode is OCEAN, RIVER, FERRY and RAIL

status.description:
Subscription Status
Possible value:
S – Subscribed
U – UnSubscribed

cnDrivingLicenceNo.description: People’s Republic of China driving licence number.

idType.description: The type of identity owned by this external user – HKID, PASSPORT, PRCEEP (PRC Exit Entry Permit) or OTHER

vehicleType.description:
Vehicle type
Possible value:
BT – Box truck
CT – Container truck
TT – Tow truck
OT – Others

vehicleOtherType.description: Vehicle Type Other Information (applicable if Vehicle Type is Other)

addrLangInd.description:
Address language indicator:
C - Chinese
E - English

chiAddress.line1: 尖沙咀彌敦道100號嘉華大廈12樓

tswDocId.description: TSW Document ID of BRN zip file
